SELECT p.*, d.dept_name FROM t_post p LEFT JOIN t_department d ON p.dept_id = d.dept_id WHERE p.post_id = #{postId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_post (post_code, post_name, post_level, salary_range, description, status, create_time, dept_id) VALUES (#{postCode}, #{postName}, #{postLevel}, #{salaryRange}, #{description}, #{status}, #{createTime}, #{deptId})
